	Proactively Performs Network Fulfilment activities. Highlights issues and drives resolution when required.

Qualifications


	Bachelors Degree Or Equivalent Experience
	1-2 years of experience required
	CompTIA A+ / Network+.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: OSP Engineer

	Proactively Performs Network Fulfilment activities. Highlights issues and drives resolution when required.

Accountant Job at Intavalto Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Intavalto Nigeria Limited is a diversified technology company based in Abuja, Nigeria, specializing in smart home automation, renewable energy products, and infrastructure solutions. We support both public and private sector clients across Sub-Saharan Africa, offering services that range from planning and design to financing, construction, operations and maintenance of critical infrastructure projects. We're committed to technical excellence, sustainability and innovation, leveraging a skilled and diverse workforce.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Accountant to join our expanding team. In this pivotal role, you will be responsible for managing and optimizing the company’s financial operations.
	Key duties will include maintaining accurate financial records, preparing comprehensive financial reports, overseeing budgets, managing accounts payable and receivable and ensuring full compliance with all financial regulations and standards.
	The ideal candidate will demonstrate strong analytical skills, a solid background in financial management, and exceptional attention to detail, ensuring the financial health and growth of the company.


Salary
N150,000 - N250,000 / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: HR@intavalto.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at Emerald Food & Beverage Company Limited
content:
Emerald Food & Beverages Company Limited is  a health and wellness benefits company specialized in the production of MANGERO premium bottled water. All our products are made with the assurance of high quality in a super hygienic environment equipped with world class state of the art processing machinery.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Admin / Procurement Officer

Job Location: Owerri, Imo

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Oversee Administrative functions, Manage procurement processes, Ensure Compliance with policies, & Coordinate with various
	Department to ensure smooth operations.


Requirments


	Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in procurement and Administration, preferably in FMCG.
	Proficient in procurement software & Microsoft Office Suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: sokoye@emeraldfb.com and copy cmtheodore@emeraldfb.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Territorial Sales Manager

Job Locations: Akwa Ibom and Benin - Edo

Job Description


	Achieve sales targets & grow market share.
	Build and maintain lasting relationships with customers & distributors.
	Identify new business opportunities & monitor market trends.
	Lead, mentor, & motivate your sales team to deliver results.
	Manage orders, deliveries, & payment collections.
	Track competitor activities and provide market insights.
	Collaborate with other departments to support sales goals.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, Sales, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of proven sales experience in FMCG (water/beverages preferred).
	Excellent communication and leadership skills.
	Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities.
	Ability to work under pressure and adapt quickl
	Proficiency in sales software and CRM tools.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: sokoye@emeraldfb.com and copy cmtheodore@emeraldfb.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Direct Sales Agent

Job Locations: Bayelsa, Cross River and Rivers

Job Description


	Identify and pursue new sales opportunities.
	Build and maintain strong customer relationships.
	Present our products to customers & highlight their benefits.
	Negotiate and close sales deals to achieve targets.
	Keep accurate records of sales and customer interactions.
	Stay informed on industry trends and competitor activities.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, Sales, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of proven sales experience in FMCG (water/beverages preferred).
	Excellent communication and leadership skills.
	Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities.
	Ability to work under pressure and adapt quickly.
	Proficiency in sales software and CRM tools.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: sokoye@emeraldfb.com and copy cmtheodore@emeraldfb.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
